author: samwilsn
content:
I have a couple EIP related questions for core devs before the next EIPIP meeting on Wednesday:

 - Would you implement an EIP where the specification is wholly or partially defined in a paid document (eg. an ISO standard)?

 - Would you implement an EIP where the specification is wholly or partially defined in a book or article referenced by some identifier (eg. DOI or ISBN)?

 - How important is durability and immutability of external references? Is a link to a blog acceptable? How about an archive.org link to the same blog?
